titleStmt.title: The fourth part of naked truth, or, The complaint of the church to some of her sons for breach of her articles in a friendly dialogue between Titus and Timothy, both ministers of the Church of England / by a legal son and since conformist to the Church of England, as established by law.
Naked truth. Part 4
titleStmt.author: Hickeringill, Edmund, 1631-1708.

notesStmt.note: Written by E. Hickeringill. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
